ticket.title: [PATCH] make association creation methods respect conditions hashes
ticket.original-body:
From the has_many documentation: > Record creations from the association are scoped if a hash is used. has_many :posts, :conditions => {:published => true} will create published posts with @blog.posts.create or @blog.posts.build.
This patch enables the same behavior for has_one and belongs_to associations. The patch was developed against the 2-3-stable branch
